name: Space Throttle
description:
Space throttle is a fun 2d single touch control game, with a lot of levels to explore!

Survival mode
Space throttle has a endless survival mode, with google play games, that helps you see other player high scores. Trying to beat friends and other players highs core is just fun.
480+ levels
Space throttle has more than 200levels to play with, more will be added in future updates

Leadership board
You can view your rank in the leadership board, against other players scores in survival mode!
